#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    char c[100000];
    char s[10];
    char ch;
    int n,t,i,j,a[26],temp,q,k;
    cin>>t;
    
    for(j=1;j<=t;j++){
        cin>>n;
        cin>>q;
        cin>>c;
        
        for(i=0;i<26;i++)
          a[i]=0;
          
        for(i=0;c[i]!='\0';i++){
            temp=c[i];
            a[temp-97]++;
        }
        
        for(i=1;i<=q;i++){
            cin>>ch;
            cin>>s;
            temp=ch;
            switch(s[0]){
                case 'e': if(a[temp-97]%2==0)
                            cout<<"yes"<<"\n";
                          else cout<<"no"<<"\n";
                          break;
                case 'o': if(a[temp-97]%2!=0)
                            cout<<"yes"<<"\n";
                          else cout<<"no"<<"\n";
                          break;
            }
        }
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
